p: In addition to different parts of walnut fruit, the antioxidant capacity of other parts of the tree by the preparation of extracts was also evaluated and reported ( Table 6). TAA, RP, FRAP, ORAC, and lipid peroxidation inhibition are the main methods used for the antioxidant capacity evaluation of the obtained extracts. Unfortunately, all the data regarding the antioxidant activity of different parts of the walnut tree are restricted to several values, and the obtained values are reported in different units.
